history.proof: intros Q p InQ neqP. induction Q as [| q Q' IH]. - simpl in InQ. contradiction. - simpl in InQ. destruct InQ as [InQ | InQ]. + subst. sauto lq: on depth: 3. + apply inskip. apply IH. apply InQ.

ctx: induction Q as [| q Q' IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q' : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM neqP : ~ eqP A eqA n (s2p p) (pO A n) IH : In p Q' -> inPolySet (s2p p) Q' Unable to unify "~ eqP A eqA n (s2p p) (pO A n)" with "inPolySet (s2p p) Q'".

ctx: induction Q as [| q Q' IH].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: induction Q as [| q Q' IH].

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p : poly A0 eqA ltM), In p Q -> ~ eqP A eqA n (s2p p) (pO A n) -> inPolySet (s2p p) Q

```coq
intros Q p InQ neqP.
induction Q as [| q Q' IH].
- simpl in InQ. contradiction.
- simpl in InQ. destruct InQ as [InQ | InQ].
  + subst. constructor.
    exact neqP.
  + apply inskip. apply IH.
    * exact InQ.
    * exact neqP.
Qed.
```

original: intros Q p InQ neqP. induction Q as [| q Q' IH]. - simpl in InQ. contradiction. - simpl in InQ. destruct InQ as [InQ | InQ]. + subst. constructor. apply neqP. + apply inskip. apply IH. * apply InQ. * apply neqP.
